item.title: Roman Polanski â€“ Chinatown
item.description: Chinatown is widely regarded as classic and surely one of Polanskis master pieces. It follows the film noir tradition, set in a drying and sun-flooded Los Angeles. The main character (the young Jack Nicholson), a private detective, is investigating the murder of the city’s chief water engineer. He is drawn in a jungle of corruption.
